qas.question: Who was the Canadian Minister of Justice?
How did Alan Dershozitz describe the Sudan?

answers.text: an example of a government that "actually deserve(s)" the appellation "apartheid."

context: Alan Dershowitz described Sudan as <a1_0>an example of a government that "actually deserve(s)" the appellation "apartheid."<a1_0/> Former <a3_0>Canadian<a3_0/> Minister of Justice <a0_0><a2_0>Irwin Cotler<a2_0/><a0_0/> echoed the accusation.
